article_html:
A Turkish couple

A Turkish couple inadvertently films the moment a 7.8 magnitude earthquake hits Nepal on Saturday. Sibel and Dinçer Yazici are filming Kathmandu's Durbar Square from a cafe when the building begins to shake violently. Bottles are seen crashing to the ground as the pair take cover. As the camera pans up, birds can be seen fleeing the area
authors: Source Olay Gazetesi Sibel Dinçer Yazici

title: Tourist films moment Nepal hit by earthquake - video
